notes:
County boundaries of Liberia

The dataset represents counties of Liberia. This is a polygon dataset that shows all 15 counties, each identified by an unique P-code. Numerical codes found in the data have been maintained. Health codes from WHO, HRinfo pcodes and OCHA pcodes have been created to facilitate each data from various sources to be linked easily. The projection is geographical (degrees) and the datum WGS 84. Scale: 1/1000000
